name: test-selection-demo-app-browserstack
description: A comprehensive full-stack web application built with React.js frontend and Node.js/Express.js backend, designed for AI model testing and demonstration purposes.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/package-lock.json server/package-lock.json package-lock.json
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && npm run install:all
